client_limiters.info: These values allow you to cap a clients max/min values.

max_diameter.info: The maximum diameter of a hole that can be filled. Min: 3, Max: 48, Default: 32.

max_volume.info: The maximum volume of a hole that can be filled. Min: 1, Max: 10000, Default: 2000.

max_undo_timer.info: The maximum time in seconds that a player has to undo a fill. Min: 1, Max: 120, Default: 120.

min_fill_speed.info: The minimum speed at which a hole can be filled. (Blocks/Tick) Min: 1, Max: 120, Default: 1.

server_enforced.info: These values are specific-to and enforced by the server.

allow_free_dirt.info: Whether or not players can fill holes with dirt for free. Default: true.

light_sources_per_torch.info: The number of light sources that a torch can provide. Min: 1, Max: 128, Default: 6.

torch_return_rate.info: The rate at which torches return to the player. Min: 0, Max: 1, Default: 0.7.

log_throws.info: Whether or not to log thrown Hole Fillers.

hole_maker_max_charge.info: The maximum charge that a hole maker can build up. Radius is charge * 2. Min: 1, Max: 8, Default: 8.

hole_maker_nuke.info: Whether or not the hole maker can nuke. (Charge for 10 seconds). Radius is 40. Note: max_charge must also be maxed.

blacklist.info: Determine who these items are available to. [-1]-Disabled, [0]-All, [1]-OP (requires OP Level 2)

hf.info: Whether or not to include the hole filler.

hf_choice.info: Whether or not to include the hole filler choice.

hf_choice_slice.info: Whether or not to include the hole filler choice slice.

hf_smart.info: Whether or not to include the hole filler smart.

hf_water.info: Whether or not to include the hole filler water.

hf_lava.info: Whether or not to include the hole filler lava.

hf_light_and_dark.info: Whether or not to include the hole filler light and dark.

inventory_sync.info: Whether or not to include inventory synchronization.

hole_maker.info: Whether or not to include the hole maker.
